docs.lead_paragraph: All right, class, here's a quiz on the state of American political parties. True or false:

headline.main: THE REPUBLICANS TRY TO GET THEIR ACT TOGETHER; REPUBLICANS

docs.abstract: Article on Repub Party's attempt at unifying by '80 Pres election; sees need not for ideological commitment but for broad and inclusive appeals to Amers on issues that concern everyone; sees party adopting more middle-of-the-road pol ideology, despite attempts by conservative factions to prevent such an image; discusses possible Pres candidates, including Sens Baker and Dole, Ill Gov James R Thompson, George Bush, Lowell Weicker, John Connally, ex-Pres Ford and Reagan; Reagan, Ford, Baker, party chmn Brock pors; drawing (L)
docs.snippet: All right, class, here's a quiz on the state of American political parties. True or false:

docs.lead_paragraph: An international research study has found that an existing drug, Anturane, can more than halve the incidence of sudden deaths from heart attacks among people who have previously had at least one heart attack.

headline.main: Drug Used for Gout Found to Cut Deaths From 2d Heart Attacks; Anturane Halves Rate of Fatal Repeat Seizures in U.S.-Canada Study of 1,475 Patients Gout Drug Is Found to Reduce Deaths From 2d Heart Attacks Death Rates Compared Uncertainty Would Remain Heart Attack's Cause Unknown

docs.snippet: An international research study has found that an existing drug, Anturane, can more than halve the incidence of sudden deaths from heart attacks among people who have previously had at least one heart attack.

docs.abstract: US-Canada study on drug anturane is 1st of several studies to evaluate drug's effect on arteriosclerosis (L)
